reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Anchorage motel in Lorne during late Aug 2007. Unlike what I read in the other reviews, I actually find this place above average.
reviews.title: Great Value, exceeded expectations
Musty Anchorage
reviews.text: The lady at the reception was very polite welcoming. She even gave us extra info on golf courses around the place, knowing that we were there for a golfing vacation.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, convenient motel located on main strip, 2 minutes from beach.
reviews.title: Good motel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just had a studio room, It was spacious and spotless and handy to everything without being too close or noisy. Pool was wonderful. Why don't more use salt.
reviews.title: lovely spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff are a lovely young family- friendly and helpful, though a trifle disorganised which added to the character of the place!.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Anchorage Motel because when we arrived to Lorne, the budget accomodations were all closed or full. We were trying to travel on a cheaper budget so were disappointed to pay for a more expensive place, but we were not let down. The room was big and spotless. The mattress had heating pads and the bathroom had a huge tub. The motel is right in the middle of town, so you can't beat the location.
reviews.title: LOVED this place

reviews.text: We were offered this accomodation via the local tourist information centre.
reviews.title: Loved the Anchorage
